entities.name: death eater
entities.description: The Death Eater is described as a person who is wearing a mask, but it slips so that he cannot see. He has a wand and is trying to cast a spell.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as ducking down behind another desk to avoid the Death Eater's spell. He is with Hermione and they are trying to catch up with the Death Eater.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as catching up with Harry and shouting 'STUPEFY!' to cast a spell on the Death Eater.

entities.name: bell jar
entities.description: The bell jar is described as glittering and being next to the Death Eater. Harry expects it to make a clunk sound when the Death Eater hits it.

entities.name: glass-fronted cabinet
entities.description: The glass-fronted cabinet is described as being on the wall and containing variously shaped hour-glasses. It falls to the floor, bursts apart, and then mends itself before falling down again.

entities.name: hour-glasses
entities.description: The hour-glasses are described as being in the glass-fronted cabinet. They are variously shaped.

relationships.description: The Death Eater is trying to cast a spell on Harry, but Hermione intervenes and casts a spell that hits the Death Eater instead.
The Death Eater is expected to hit the bell jar, but it does not make a clunk sound because the Death Eater collapses backward instead.
Harry ducks down behind another desk to avoid the Death Eater's spell.
Hermione casts a spell on the Death Eater, shouting 'STUPEFY!'
